website_summaries.verdict: A durable tent for a reasonable price that stands out for how incredibly simple it is to set up, take down, and transport.
pros: Has the brand's easy-to-use hub system that makes it simple to set up in seconds, even for 1 person
Taking it down is just as easy
Material is lightweight yet durable and resists moisture
cons: Interior isn't quite as large as some other models, but there are few complaints otherwise

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I slept in this with my son on a queen sized air mattress and it was perfect. Maybe a foot or two of space left after putting the mattress in. This tent was phenomenal!
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent to go camping with my friends. This tent is just right for me to sleep with my husband. It's very easy to setup. The waterproof effect is good when it rains lightly. Good !
customer_reviews.author: dax

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for scouts. It’s extremely light weight and very easy to put up and take down. And there are no extra poles to it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tent that I have ever been use! It’s so convenient! I can set up this tent literally in 1 second! The best part is the storage bag, I can never get the tent back to its original folding pattern. So most of the time I would stuff he tent inside the bag. And it still fit! It’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Elegant design, but not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Just tried my tent this past weekend, and it lightly rained overnight. Setup was ridiculously easy, by far the fastest setup I've experienced short of those twist collapsible pop-up tents. The PVC basin held up, the zipper was not horribly finicky, and the rain fly held. However, when I woke up in the morning, I found water inside the tent along the edges. Apparently, rainwater seeped in through the seams where the sidewalls meet the basin. I will attempt to weatherproof it, but if you're expecting inclement weather soon after getting this, you're in for a rude awakening (literally).
customer_reviews.author: VS1979

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Room for 2 ppl OR 1 person and your camping gear, knapsack, etc. Even though it took about 4 mins to complete, it was too much for me. I gave up and let someone else do it... LoL
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a tent of this quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Great price for a tent of this quality!! I'm not a experience camper. This tent super easy to setup!! About 10 minutes I get it setup...! It can fit 2 queen sized blowup mattresses in there!! Also when tear down and very fit back into its original bag!!Very impressed!!! We will be using on our next camping trip!! This tent is light weight. I'd absolutely recommend this tent to anyone looking for an easy carry!
customer_reviews.author: Lanny

customer_reviews.title: Great tent!
customer_reviews.text: The tent is very easy to set up and it can really hold its place no matter how strong the wind is in the open field. The material of the tent is absolutely fantastic in terms of water-proof and cold resistance. The packaging is nice as well as the detailed instruction, helping me to set up this tent within 10 minutes. I really do like the little hook inside the tent is thoughtful, which really makes it much easier for me to hook up the light inside the tent. Overall there's really nothing to complain about. Perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: abel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Only 2 people can fit comfortably unless they are 3 children. My 9 year old and me fit ok but there was no room for anything else our clothes and supplies had to be left outside in our wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee R.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Very compact and super easy to put up/down. Purchased for those quick spir of the moment camping get away trips.
customer_reviews.author: maria j fierro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! Set up in 2 minutes. Extremely easy, think I need to buy the big one from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla McKnight

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it for indoor camping
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tent from last month, we are thinking to go outside camping because the COVID-19 virus haven’t control yet, so we rather to stay at home. We set up this tent inside our house pretend we are camping for our kids, they are so happy and love it. Very easy to open and close. I bought a 3 person size so it’s a good size for a small family.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Zhou

customer_reviews.title: User set-up friendly tent.
customer_reviews.text: Easy set-up. My grandsons (and me) love it. It’s set up in my extra room. It’s Zen!
customer_reviews.author: audibledarkness

customer_reviews.title: good price and high quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tent for my son. He loves the colors. It's light weight and easy to setup. Really good price and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: young Marines
customer_reviews.text: I have three daughters. They are all young Marines. They often go out for camping. training. This three-person tent is very convenient. Easy to set up. Ventilation. Rainproof. The children like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Pure genius!
customer_reviews.text: As an avid camper for years, I have had my share of tents — and hated every single one of them. Until this purchase! I absolutely love our Mobihome dome tent. It took me and my ten year old daughter literally one minute to set it up! Usually I can't set a tent up at all and give up lol. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Received used when purchased new
customer_reviews.text: The tent was purchased as new however it was used. There was dirt and dust all over the tent, and one of the feet is broken so I was unable to stake it down completely. It's a lot smaller than expected, being a 2-3 person tent, but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Scouts
customer_reviews.text: Great tent, easy to assemble. Perfect for my Boy Scout.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not for Average Size Adults
customer_reviews.text: This is a kids tent. There is no way 3 people are fitting in this thing comfortably. I am 5’11” and with a low profile air bed, my head and feet press against the sides. It also barely fits a full air bed, I thought I was going to rip it apart trying to cram it in there. If you are a normal sized adult, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent at good price
customer_reviews.text: Great tent at a great price easy set up/tear down
customer_reviews.author: R. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Comfy Haven for my son and I
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this tent very much. One of the goals for our mother/son camping was that the tent be easy to set up. My 11 year old son set the tent up all on his own. We were the first ones in camp to have our tent up - it's super easy and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gladhart

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy with high BAC
customer_reviews.text: I can set this up in seconds after having too many adult beverages. No more cursing and swearing as I stumble around in the dark trying to hurt myself with oldschool tent poles. Takes more space when packed than my old tent, but is very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Lanes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent
customer_reviews.text: Take it out of the package and it’s already set up! Comes with rain protector tent, I’d recommend buying a tarp for underneath of course. Front unzips to a nice screen in part of the tent (perfect for watching the stars!) definitely the best purchase I’ve made!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This tent is big enough to hold 4 person. Me, my wife and 2 kids. So lovely and come with a cover sheet on the top. Easy to set it up, light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This tent was unbelievably easy to set up, just like in the video. Taking down was just as simple, although as with any tent, it took some adjusting to get the air out and size down where it could fit in the bag. Still, only a total take down time of probably 3 minutes... I was packed up long before my fellow campers. It rained and I remained completely dry! great tent for the cash
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Grant Carter

customer_reviews.title: Torn tent bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the tent! We haven’t used yet. It was quick to put up. However, I just saw that the bag is split open (again - never used the tent yet). I don’t want to go theu hassle of returning the tent. Light weight! One person - even me- can put up easily!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent deal
customer_reviews.text: The tent is light, a bit too long to fit in my bag, but easy enough to carry. With a ground tarp, I stayed completely dry while it was rainy, and it wasn't too hot on the mid summer trips. The rain fly strings are a bit of a tripping hazard if you are half drunk and half awake trying to find a restroom, but it was spacious enough for me and two large dogs. I'd suggest getting some of those ridiculously orange stakes for visibility and because the ones included will get bent like all the ones included with tents seem to.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hays

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love the instant setup. It literally went up in 30 seconds. The only complaint for me is the fabric: I could feel the wetness from just morning fog/mist (there was no rain), not sure how it would perform under the rain.
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Great little tent!
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up tent!!! I took my son for a camping trip and since it was just me and him I needed an easy up tent for me to use. This was perfect. It’s small but I fit my queen size blow up mattress inside and you had about 5 more inches of space to put your belongings or shoes and what not. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a small 2 person tent and no hassle of putting together with all those poles
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Rice

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely worth the money. Not for tall people
customer_reviews.text: Set up is the easiest and fastest that I have ever experienced in a tent. You could not go wrong only weighed about 5.5 lbs 🍒🍒
customer_reviews.author: Telldanny

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small.
customer_reviews.text: Tent was good. Tight for a three person tent. I doubt you could get three in there comfortably but two was alright. I put two heavy coats of waterproofing spray and it still let in a little water but not enough to really get anything wet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good overall except if you have a cot
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to setup which was as advertised, the only thing is that it's a little small in my opinion as I can barely fit a small cot inside so I would not recommend it if you have one
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. You can not beat it for the price. Super easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy P Busa

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Not a very good quality tent the zipper broke the second time we used it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Needs larger rainfly
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it's a great tent. Literally the only issue that has been a problem is the rainfly is too short on the sides. The rainfly cover only 4 inches past the mesh which has been a problem through 2 large thunderstorms.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt1991

customer_reviews.title: not the most practical tent for backpackers
customer_reviews.text: Too big to carry it for a hiking trip (no way you can fit it in your backpack) but very easy to set it up
customer_reviews.author: Amin

customer_reviews.title: Good but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and visually appealing but had some small tears inside that could let bugs in
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and take down for just one person. Could easily fit two people, air mattress and duffle bags. Can't comment on weather because it did not rain. Will weatherproof tent just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent. It's so easy to put up and take down. I was able to pop it up within two minutes, same with taking it down. Actually bought it with my grandsons in mind. Wanted something they could put up by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: This tent really goes up in ten seconds!
customer_reviews.text: This tent is like no other! The quickest set up and take down of anything I've seen. No more assembling poles and sliding them through the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Fastest set up ever
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put up and take down. It’s lightweight and doesn’t take up a lot of room when packed up.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Way smaller than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: So after that unboxing the tent I realized that it can’t hold 2-3 people. It could barely hold one person in it. I’m 5’10 and I had a very hard time moving around. This tent is for kids not a grown adult. My return window closed not to long ago, cause I would’ve definitely returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rubens Battle

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up.
customer_reviews.text: The tent is so easy to set up. It is a 3 man but 2 adults just for sleeping will work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and take down! Well worth the money. Fits a full size air mattress pretty comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Kept us secure from the elements.
customer_reviews.text: My son and I needed a tent for a last-minute camping trip. This tent over exceeded my expectations. It was very easy to set up and take down. Kept us nice and warm from the elements as it was a little bit cold outside. I definitely will be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jewell Smith

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to set up. Also to put away. Tent is as described. I have no complaints. Other than I need a bigger tent.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Flores

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: Very inpressed with the quality and ease of use. Recommend anytime
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Quality tent with easy setup for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. Setup and takedown was made easy for first time camper. Wanted something that wouldn’t cause a headache and this tent met my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy setup and take down
customer_reviews.text: Not an experienced camper and had never owned a tent, so needed something not too costly but easy to use. This was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

product_meta.title: Mobihome 3 Person Tents for Camping, Instant Backpacking Quick Tent Easy Set Up, Portable 2 Person Dome Tent for Hiking & Mountain Outdoor, with Rainfly and Ventilated Top Mesh - 7' x 6.3'
feature_bullets: INSTANT QUICK UP TENT - Special hub system design for single operation - Up in seconds, down in a flash; Set up in seconds - Roll it out, lock your poles, pull the drawstring and QUICK UP the tent, so easy!
DURABLE & VENTILATIVE - 190T polyester camping tent fly for 100% water-resistance; Sturdy, watertight PE tent floor; Big micro mesh roof & door with rainfly for better ventilation;

LIGHTWEIGHT & WATER-RESISTANT - Compact and portable backpacking tent for easy setup; High-class fabrics, sealed seams and fully taped rainfly, rain-resistant door/window seals for strong water-resistance;
COMFORTABLE & LONG-LASTING - Breathable micro mesh & 2-door tent & 2-way zippers give dual system comfort; Reinforced taped seams and anchor points offer tents a long-lasting life time;

WHAT YOU GET - 3 Person tent is fully equipped with rainfly X 1, storage pocket X 1, steel pegs X 8, guy rope x 4, carrying bag X 1; Base Size: 7' x 6.3', Center Height: 43", Total Weight: 6.8 lbs; Customer friendly 1-year warranty; If you have any questions, welcome to contact our amazing customer service.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
